validityText:
The input consists of three sentences: "Waves crash.", "Grass grows.", and "Stars shine.". According to the input specification, the input must contain at least three sentences. This input satisfies the specification, as it clearly contains exactly three sentences. There is no indication that the sentences must be of a particular length or complexity, just that there should be at least three. Therefore, the input complies with the specification.

OK
